ovdesc.p: This is a new Application, used to define if we change the Interest Rate automatically during the End Of Day.
The key of this file can be made of any alphanumeric characters (4 char max).

are optional fields. A blank value means systematic rate change whatever the deviation between the deposit rate and the current standard rate. If no automatic allocation must be applied, 0 must be keyed in

desc.p: Defines the up variance for know if the rate must be changed.
If the fields is blank, the rate is always changed, and if the value is 0, no change is done
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered
